description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Rundll32 in Scripts Author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use Rundll32
query: (((powershell.command.invocation_details:*\&&* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*\&&*) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:*rundll32* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*rundll32*) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:*shell32.dll* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*shell32.dll*) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:*shellexec_rundll* OR winlog.event_data.Payload:*shellexec_rundll*)) AND (powershell.command.invocation_details:(*value* OR *invoke* OR *comspec* OR *iex*) OR winlog.event_data.Payload:(*value* OR *invoke* OR *comspec* OR *iex*)))
